content: If you are interested in learning more about the State of Missouri's eLTSS use case and testing, join us at the HL7 FHIR Connectathon 1:45pm ET here: https://whova.com/portal/webapp/hlsfh_202109/Agenda/1910344

Note: Connectathon track announcements are a bit narrow for the Announcements stream. Feel free to post that sort of thing on #social if you want to send out a broad invite. (In most cases posting to the stream(s) directly related to the track is sufficient.)
